metadata.description: He's a contract killer and he's an unlucky bastard. He made a mess of a simple job and Momo, his Boss, gives him a last chance to remedy and save his life. But he's a perpetual loser and his chronic clumsiness creates a pile of dead bodies. Now he's a sitting duck for Momo's gang. Last on the List, is a bloody tale with sharp dialog and black humor that carries readers to a pyrotechnic conclusion.
metadata.name: The Last on the List
